mapper.select: select up.id, title, up.userEmail, userNickname, commissionStatus, profileHit, personalWork from portfolio_upload up left join (select userEmail, userNickname, commissionStatus from profile_user_info) us on us.userEmail = up.userEmail limit #{offset} , #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update portfolio_upload set profileHit = ifnull(profileHit, 0) +1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from portfolio_upload up left join profile_user_info us on us.userEmail = up.userEmail

select up.id, up.userEmail, title, up.userEmail, content, userNickname, profileIntroduce, commissionStatus, personalWork, messageStart, messageEnd, myPageUrl from portfolio_upload up left join (select userEmail, userNickname, profileIntroduce, commissionStatus, time_format(messageStart, '%H:%i') as messageStart, time_format(messageEnd, '%H:%i') as messageEnd, myPageUrl from profile_user_info) us on us.userEmail = up.userEmail where id=#{id}
